column4: is this a really stupid question or something? please put me out of my misery!
Or asked in a different way, which ubuntu version?
Then minimized windows should be accesible from the menubar on the left
so if i minimise (say) a chrome window, a new item should appear on the left?
Yes, a chrome icon should appear
there's already a chrome icon, but clicking on it doesn't bring up any of the chrome minimised windows
Do you see a small white triangle next to it?
Hm. If you hold down the Alt key and hit TAB, do you see it?
It should work even if it wasn't in that dock. Sounds like you've encountered some bug in unity. Have you installed all the latest updates?
i think so (all the ones it suggested anyway)
Hm. Ok. And by chrome, you mean google-chrome, not chromium, right?
i think so. Chrome as suggested when searching from the Applications icon
That sounds like chromium. It has a blue icon?
no, it has the usual (coloured wheel) icon
Ah, that's google chrome. I'll try installing that on Ubuntu 11.04 and see if I can reproduce it.
